AsyncLazy<T>

Provides a lazy-initialized task, allowing asynchronous initialization of the value.

Author

Represents an author of an embed.

CommandData

Represents data associated with a command, including its name, description, and usage.

Die

Represents a single die used in tabletop gaming.

DownloadTracker

Tracks the downloading of users from guilds to ensure they are downloaded within specified intervals.

Represents URLs for coin images.

Provides methods to handle errors that occur during the login process.

MewdekoModule

Base class for Discord command modules with support for localization and string resources.

MewdekoModuleBase<TService>

Base class for Discord command modules with a specified service type and support for localization and string resources.

MewdekoRandom

A class that provides cryptographically secure random number generation. Inherits from the Random class.

MewdekoSlashCommandModule

Base class for slash command modules in Mewdeko.

MewdekoSlashModuleBase<TService>

Base class for generic slash command modules in Mewdeko.

MewdekoSlashSubmodule

Base class for generic slash submodule in Mewdeko.

MewdekoSlashSubmodule<TService>

Base class for generic slash submodule with a service in Mewdeko.

MewdekoSubmodule

Base class for submodules of Discord command modules.

MewdekoSubmodule<TService>

Base class for submodules of Discord command modules with a specified service type.

Represents a new embed message.

Represents a component in a new embed message.

A static class responsible for parsing command-line options.

OsuMapData

Represents data extracted from an Osu! map.

OsuUserBests

Represents a user's best performance on an Osu! map.

RollResult

Represents the result of rolling multiple dice.

SmartEmbed

Thumbnail

Represents a thumbnail image for an embed.

ToneTag

Represents a tone tag used for tagging messages or content with a specific tone or theme.

Represents the source of a tone tag, including the title and URL.
